title: Voyageurs National Park: NPS Centennial
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     NPS Centennial             NPS Centennial       The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks. Find Your Park Experiences offer unique opportunities to explore national parks both in person and online. Check out the experiences in this park or search all experiences to identify an opportunity that matches your interests. You can also share your national park story at FindYourPark.com. A Call to Action remains the foundation for our 2016 centennial preparations. It is the National Park Service's blueprint for the future, outlining the innovative work we want to accomplish. Voyageurs National Park is a big part of this effort.       Voyageurs NPS Centennial Celebration Here at Voyaguers, we too will be helping to celebrate the National Park Service's 100 years of service. From rehabilitating infrastructure to special events, find out how we're celebrating in northern Minnesota.          The Aurora Borealis at Voyageurs National Park NPS, Steve Dimse  Experience Many different memorable experiences await at Voyageurs. Find your park now.  Enlist with the Voyageurs Nature's Light Show Stand on Rock Half the Age of the Earth Tour the Lake's in Style    To find other national park experiences, visit the experiences search. Call to Action Projects Learn more about the work the NPS is doing to prepare for the future.
